ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-np6:1.1_0: At one time when the Buddha was staying at Sāvatthī in Anāthapiṇḍika’s Monastery,
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-np6:1.2_0: At that time the lay followers collected voluntary contributions to supply the Sangha of nuns with robes. They stored the requisites in a cloth merchant’s shop, and then went to the nuns and said,
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-np6:1.3_0: “Venerables, requisites to be used for robes are stored in such-and-such a cloth merchant’s shop. Please have someone get cloth from that and share it out.”
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-np6:1.4_0: But the nuns exchanged those requisites for tonics, which they then used.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-np6:1.5_0: When the lay followers found out about this, they complained and criticized them,
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-np6:1.6_0: “When requisites belonging to the Sangha are designated for a specific purpose, how could the nuns exchange them for something else?”
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-np6:1.7_0: The nuns heard the complaints of those lay followers,
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-np6:1.8_0: The nuns of few desires complained and criticized her,
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-np6:1.9_0: “When requisites belonging to the Sangha are designated for a specific purpose, how could the nuns exchange them for something else?” ...
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-np6:1.10_0: “Is it true, monks, that the nuns did this?”
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-np6:1.13_0: “... When requisites belonging to the Sangha are designated for a specific purpose, how could the nuns exchange them for something else?
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-np6:1.14_0: This won’t give rise to confidence in those without it ...”
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-np6:1.15_0: “And, monks, the nuns should recite this training rule like this:
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-np6:1.16.1_0: ‘When a requisite belonging to the Sangha is designated for a specific purpose, if a nun exchanges it for something else, she commits an offense entailing relinquishment and confession.’”
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-np6:2.1.4_0: ...The nun who has been given the full ordination by both Sanghas through a legal procedure consisting of one motion and three announcements that is irreversible and fit to stand—this sort of nun is meant in this case.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-np6:2.1.5_0: A requisite is designated for a specific purpose:
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-np6:2.1.6_0: it was given for a specific purpose.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-np6:2.1.8_0: belonging to the Sangha, not to an individual nun.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-np6:2.1.10_0: if, apart from the purpose for which it was given, she exchanges it for something else, then for the effort there is an act of wrong conduct.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-np6:2.1.11_0: When he gets the robe-cloth, it becomes subject to relinquishment.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-np6:2.1.12_0: It is to be relinquished to the Sangha of nuns, a group, or an individual nun.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-np6:2.1.13_0: “And, monks, it should be relinquished like this. ...
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-np6:2.1.15_0: ‘Venerables, this thing, which I got in exchange for a requisite belonging to the Sangha that was designated for a specific purpose, is to be relinquished. I relinquish it to the Sangha.’
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-np6:2.2.1_0: If it is for a specific purpose and she perceives that it is, and she exchanges it for something else, she commits an offense entailing relinquishment and confession.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-np6:2.2.2_0: If it is for a specific purpose, but she is unsure of it, and she exchanges it for something else, she commits an offense entailing relinquishment and confession.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-np6:2.2.3_0: If it is for a specific purpose, but she does not perceive that it is, and she exchanges it for something else, she commits an offense entailing relinquishment and confession.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-np6:2.2.4_0: When she receives in return what had been relinquished, it is to be used in accordance with the intention of the donors.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-np6:2.2.5_0: If it is not for a specific purpose, but she perceives that it is, she commits an offense of wrong conduct.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-np6:2.2.6_0: If it is not for a specific purpose, but she is unsure of it, she commits an offense of wrong conduct.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-np6:2.2.7_0: If it is not for a specific purpose, and she does not perceive that it is, there is no offense.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-np6:2.3.1_0: there is no offense for him.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-np6:2.3.2_0: if she makes use of the remainder;
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-np6:2.3.3_0: if she makes use of it after getting permission from the owners;
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-np6:2.3.5_0: if she is the first offender.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-np6:2.3.6_0: The sixth training rule is finished.
